p: With regard to the antioxidant activity, to identify the statistically significant differences ( p < 0.05), one-way ANOVA was applied to the obtained analytical data, as well as Duncan’s test. Pearson’s correlation coefficients between the different essential oil components and the ORAC values were calculated using SPSS (Statistical Package for the Social Sciences) 14.0 software package (IBM Corporation, Armonk, NY, USA).
